attributes.additional_details: Nhs cut backs mean they are facing closing calderdale a&e in a bid to raise £50M. But what cost to the public? A&e deals with life and death, and distances between hospitals are too great. Do people have time to travel to a new hospital at a greater distance? Sign to prove you care and you need calderdale a&e

rejection.details: Please see - Hands off Calderdale A&E
